title: Tuna and Egg Salad
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1 (185g) tin tuna, drained', '225g low fat cottage cheese', '4 tablespoons chopped celery', '4 tablespoons spring onions', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon lemon pepper', '1/4 teaspoon celery salt', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '4 tablespoons mayonnaise']
